Hello friend this is a message to all people that have not been lured into the dark side with cheap tricks and gimmicks. We who stand strong must destroy the force known as The Johnny Depp Fan Club. If you have not been phased by the wave of evil that has swept the nation with good looks, scizzor hands and various drugs such as Heroin, LSD and other mind altering agents you must resist the temptations set before you and try to destroy the Dark Lord Johnny Depp and all of his followers including Natalie Wallen and Erin Berka the hottest babes ever created. Do not I repeat do not look into their eyes or your heart will grow cold and your soul will be captured and stored inside a jar in the Johnny Depp Mansion (related to the famous playboy mansion) where he will curse you forever and your heart will grow cold. You can distinguish some of his followers by the following list. They may become involved in various cults some that will involve sexual mageick (different from wizard magic, much more dark and evil), using drugs to become illuminated and becoming involved in homosexual orgies. They may have Johnny Depp shrines or large stacks of photos or Depp fan magazines that are covered in saliva and or other bodily fluids. These so called Depp Disciples may have gone to many Johnny Depp fan sites on their computer or he/she/it may have him as a backround or instant messanger buddy icon. If you notice that when talking to a person that has been sucked into this very Demonic cult, he/she/it will very often tend to talk about movies that include Johnny Depp and or other unknown Dark Lords. The only way to save these people from eternal damnation would be telling them about Conan O'Brien or tieing them up and forceing them to watch the show at least three times a day(11:00am comedy central, 5:00pm comedy central and 11:37pm NBC). This is a very dangerous procedure so do not attempt to do so if you are weak and haven't watched Conan in a few days. While attempting this you must NOT make eye contact with them and do not let them talk to you so duct tape their mouth shut or put a gag in their mouth. Wish me luck for I will try to lure Natalie away from the sex, drugs and demonic rituals, Erin on the other hand cannot be helped so don't hate me for being beautiful, so if you do not see me ever again I might have been lured into the evil association or sacraficed to one of their gods. I bid you farewell...

Hello this is matt notifying anyone that is at this site that i have been banned from the computer at both my mom's house and my dad's house. I have been banned by my stepparents (mr. havel lookalike andy and mail-order bride valia). The reasons of why I am being punished in this unusually cruel way is... for punching my sister at my dad's house and telling her to "beat it your time is up" and talking on AOL instant messanger all day while my parents were at work screwing off. At my Dad's house soon after doing the previous my stepsister ran to my stepmom and made herself cry so that i would be banished from the fun machine. At my mom's house I have a 1 hour time limit for the internet. I was on the internet for only an hour, (when SBC kicked me off) after this I could not look at internet sites but could still talk to people on AIM because the internet connection was not closed off. I continued to talk to various species of humans and machines when my stepfather waltzed into the doorway and yelled at me saying, "You just don't get it, i have that time limit for a reason." I then stormed off into my room thinking of what pennywise the dancing clown would do in a situation like this. He would crawl out from the sewer and call out his name thus drawing him near the stormdrain he would then offer him a balloon. Andy being childish in nature would accept the gift and pennywise would grab is arm, rip it out of it's socket, maybe take a bite out of his armpit and say "you will float down here they always do!". This would be the end of andy but unfortunatly for me i find his fatty body disgusting and would never be able to take a bite out of his armpit and i am not nice enough to offer him a balloon. If you have any storys of being banned from the computer or evil step parents put them under the comments bulletin...NOW!
